meanings.definition: A type of neurotransmitter that plays a role in pleasure, reward, and motivation.
meanings.sent1: Dopamines help us feel happy when we achieve something.
meanings.sent2: The brain releases dopamines when we eat delicious food.
meanings.sent3: The party was so fun that even the dopamines in my brain were dancing!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter flooded her brain with dopamines, making her smile even wider.
meanings.sent5: The dopamines surged through his body, creating a wave of joy.

meanings.definition: Chemicals in the brain that transmit signals between nerve cells.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study how dopamines communicate messages in the brain.
meanings.sent2: The dopamines travel quickly to deliver important information.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dopamines played a game of telephone in his brain.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced like dopamines, connecting one idea to the next.
meanings.sent5: The dopamines whispered secrets between the nerve cells.
